attributes.action: close access to the House of Lords to any sitting MP who has been involved in the expenses and allowances scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an insult to the electorate merely to move these people from one source of unregulated self service enrichment funded by the taxpayer to another source of unregulated self-service enrichment funded by the taxpayer.  If these people are not worthy of being in the House of Commons then they CERTAINLY are not worthy of being in the House of Lords.  AND WE, THE ELECTORATE, KNOW THIS IS WITHIN THE GIFT OF THE PRIME MINISTER BECAUSE HE IS THE ONLY SOURCE OF RE-SUPPLY TO THE HOUSE OF LORDS.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
